DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: NEVES, ADRIANO J. S.;DA SILVA NEVES, ADRIANO JOSЩ;NEVES, ADRIANO JOSЩ DA SILVA;NEVES, ADRIANO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutor em Administraчуo pela Faculdade de Economia e Administraчуo(FEA) da Universidade de Sуo Paulo(USP). Possui graduaчуo em Tecnologia de Processamento de Dados pela Faculdades Integradas Hщlio Alonso-RJ(1998) e Mestrado em Engenharia da Computaчуo(2004). Atualmente щ professor de cursos de Pѓs-Graduaчуo em diversas instituiчѕes de ensino como FIA(Fundaчуo Instituto de Administraчуo), INSPER- Instituto de Ensino e Pesquisa, Fundaчуo Getњlio Vargas(FGV), Pontifэcia Universidade Catѓlica(PUC), Faculdade de Informсtica e Administraчуo Paulista(FIAP), Instituto Brasileiro de Tecnologia Avanчada(IBTA) e outras. Diretor de Educaчуo do ISACA, Capэtulo Sуo Paulo. Atuou como Coordenador do MBA em Gestуo de Projetos da Universidade Braz Cubas(UBC), MBA Gestуo de Redes(FIAP) e MBA Gestуo de Serviчos de TI (FIAP). Tem experiъncia na сrea de Administraчуo, Gestуo da Educaчуo, Gestуo da Tecnologia da Informaчуo, com ъnfase em Gestуo de Projetos e Governanчa de TI. Atuaчуo em Consultoria de Tecnologia da Informaчуo em Projetos de Data Center, Fсbrica de Software, Inteligъncia Artificial, Internet da Coisas (IoT), Big Data e BlockChain. Forte experiъncia na conduчуo de Projetos Tradicionais (Cascata) e Сgil. Experiъncia como Advisor Member em Tecnologia, Aceleradoras e StartUp. Partner em StartUps de Tecnologia (Inteligъncia Artificial, FinTech e outras).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD in Business Administration from the Faculty of Economics and Administration (FEA) of the University of Sуo Paulo (USP). He holds a degree in Data Processing Technology from Faculdades Integradas Hщlio Alonso-RJ (1998) and a Master's Degree in Computer Engineering (2004). He is currently professor of postgraduate courses in several teaching institutions such as FIA (Institute of Administration Foundation), INSPER - Institute of Education and Research, Getњlio Vargas Foundation (FGV), Pontifical Catholic University (PUC), Faculty of Informatics and Administration Paulista (FIAP), Brazilian Institute of Advanced Technology (IBTA) and others. He acted as Coordinator of the MBA in Project Management at Braz Cubas University (UBC), MBA Network Management (FIAP) and MBA IT Service Management (FIAP). Has experience in the area of ​​Administration, Education Management, Information Technology Management, with emphasis on Project Management and IT Governance. Expertise in Information Technology Consulting in Data Center Projects, Software Factory, Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things (IoT), Big Data and BlockChain.

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: ISACA- Information Systems Audit and Control Association

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
As an independent, nonprofit, global association, ISACA engages in the development, adoption and use of globally accepted, industry-leading knowledge and practices for information systems. Previously known as the Information Systems Audit and Control Association, ISACA now goes by its acronym only, to reflect the broad range of IT governance professionals it serves.

ISACA was incorporated in 1969 by a small group of individuals who recognized a need for a centralized source of information and guidance in the growing field of auditing controls for computer systems. Today, ISACA has more than 115,000 constituents worldwide.

ISACA provides practical guidance, benchmarks and other effective tools for all enterprises that use information systems. Through its comprehensive guidance and services, ISACA defines the roles of information systems governance, security, audit and assurance professionals worldwide. The COBIT framework and the CISA, CISM, CGEIT and CRISC certifications are ISACA brands respected and used by these professionals for the benefit of their enterprises.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: As market dynamics and complexity increase, the selection of IT projects, which are important to align enterprise operations and strategy, face challenges from cost-benefit related conception, to criteria for project definition. This research has the objective to present a case study for the process of adoption of a multi-criteria method through AHP ? Analytic Hierarchy Process by a large Brazilian multinational company in the oil & gas segment. The authors prepared a descriptive qualitative research based on survey data from semi-structured interviews with key company professionals involved throughout the implementation process. The results obtained indicated that the company, based on a medium to long term strategic plan passed by the realignment in the criteria of the decision-making model, through the enhancement of demand and project portfolio prioritization under IT. The study also aims to explore from company's senior management expectations up to the details on the challenges encountered during implementation and use of the method chosen by the corporation.
